text: Have you tried anything like that before, or have opinions about how well that might work (or fail)?

text:
I think to really comment on it I'd have to dig in more into the context here...i've been pretty checked out from development related to this for the past several years

happy to have a call to catch up on it though (also it's been too long since we hung out anyway so we should catch up regardless :grin:)
